Also, the instructions on getting it set up are crystal clear, I LOVE THAT! I’m the worst at understanding technical directions but I’ve been able to figure this little thing out really easily.

So, this clock lets you choose the brightness that it will go up to when you set the alarm and also the time range for when it will go from the lowest possible setting up to whatever you set it to. For example, I wake up at 7AM and set it for a 30 min range. So, from 6:30 to 7 it will go from the lowest light to the brightest light. At exactly 7 it will play birds chirping at a low volume per my preferences, and that’s how I wake up everyday. Some days I wake up just a little before 7 and just lay there waiting for the birds to cue me to get out of bed. It’s a nice, gentle wake up.

I do wish that the light was possibly a little brighter but it gets the job done so I can’t really complain. Also, I’ve only tried the sleep mode out once and didn’t care for it, but I think that’s just a personal thing. I’m able to get to sleep relatively quickly and once I’m in bed I like complete darkness so it only annoyed me. Whatever. Speaking of dimming lights, the digital face-time thing can be dimmed! (There is full brightness, dimmed brightness, and off, where you can’t see anything on the screen but it’s still running) I really like this because I used to have to cover other alarm clocks since they were too bright and I prefer near-total darkness to sleep. When the time is dimmed it doesn’t light up your whole bedroom and glancing at the clock in the middle of the night doesn’t bother my eyes or disturb my sleepiness at all.

Another cool little thing I like is that it keeps the time if you unplug it. I renovated my room this past weekend and had it unplugged for like a full day and when I plugged it back in the time was still accurate. Anytime I unplugged it to move it around, it kept the time just fine. I even dropped it once and it was fine. (Barely scuffed it, thank goodness it’s not glass)

Con: It’s a little more lightweight and plastic-y than I expected when I got it, so if you’re someone who wants your alarm clock to look and feel extra lux in your hands, this may come off as a little cheap-ish seeming when you get it. (that’s how I felt when I first opened it) but it still looks really nice, and most importantly, works really well.

All in all, I’m hella happy with my purchase and I highly recommend other folks give it a try. You’ll wake up less grumpy and for other not-morning people like myself, it makes morning incrementally less awful.

data.title: Cheaper Alternative
data.body:
I know people rave about the hatch but i’m glad i found this dupe! Love it and helps me wake
up naturally and less groggy in the morning.

data.title: Finally found the perfect alarm clock!
data.body:
I bought this because I always have trouble waking up in the morning, especially in the darker months. I have tried a variety of different ways to wake myself up slowly. The one that worked the best before this alarm was playing a radio station of soft music on low volume. However, this alarm clock has definitely beat that. I find myself waking up naturally to the light, and not feeling exhausted, I was woken from a deep sleep, which is how almost every other method makes me feel.

When it comes to the specifics of the clock, I don’t really use anything other than the sunlight function. Sometimes I’ll use it as a low light reading lamp at night, but I don’t need the radio or sound feature and won’t be using it. The speaker isn’t super high-quality anyway. I also don’t really need to use it as a clock so I always dim the numbers that show up. My one complaint is that each morning after the sunlight turns on, even if I’ve turned the clock light off (showing the numbers) the night before, the clock light will come on again. So essentially, if you want to use it only as a sunlight lamp, and not a clock, you need to manually dim the clock number lights every day. Not the end of the world, but would really like if there was a way to turn off the clock completely.

Overall, I would recommend this product. It definitely has improved my mornings.

data.title: So good she got 2.
data.body:
I really like this product, but my wife ended up getting 2 off them for Christmas and my return window is closed. I'm trying to reach out and see what my options are.
Thank you

data.title: Just Plugged Up
data.body: Just set up for the first time! Fingers crossed my teenager starts waking up with this alarm clock ⏰️

data.title: Great alarm clock!
data.body: I had been researching sunrise alarms for awhile and found this one! I love the multiple mood and night light colors, as well as all the possible ways to configure the alarms (sounds, volume, light brightness, length of dawn time). I also love that you have several options for the display brightness of the time, including off. The only thing I wish was different was that it had a longer cord but I made it work so it’s not that big of an issue.

data.title: Life Changing - Absolutely Amazing
data.body:
This makes waking up in the morning so much easier. I often wake up gracefully very soon after the light comes on. I have it set to come on 20 minutes before my alarm.

I don't wake up nearly as groggy as I used to. That even applies to nights when I don't get nearly enough sleep. I looked around for a good one before purchasing this one, and this one is better than the rest in many ways. Get it if you're thinking about it!

My only gripe is the annoying noise it makes when you turn off the alarm. It is quite loud, which makes no sense because you've already gotten up and out of bed to turn it off. If you share a room with somebody, this might be an issue for it is far louder than the pleasant sound you hear that gradually wakes you up. I don't get it...

Overall a great device and you should buy it anyways.

data.title: A Dreamy Sleep Companion for Kids
data.body:
We purchased this alarm clock for our 3-year-old daughter, and I'm thrilled to report that it has been a solid five-star addition to her nightly routine. After a year of consistent use, this clock has truly proven its worth in our household.

The soft glow emitted by the light is absolutely perfect. It strikes that delicate balance between not being too bright to disrupt sleep yet not too dim to provide a comforting ambiance. This gentle glow has become an essential part of our daughter's sleep routine, making her transition to sleep smoother and more relaxed.

One of the unexpected perks of this clock is its educational value. Our daughter has taken to trying to tell the time on the clock, and the easy-to-read numbers make it an engaging learning tool. It's wonderful to see her curiosity sparked by such a simple yet effective feature.

While we don't rely heavily on the sleep or wake sounds, they do add a touch of serenity to the overall experience. They may not be particularly loud, but their calming nature makes them a pleasant addition for winding down or gently waking up.

In conclusion, this clock has been a dreamy sleep companion for our little one. Its soft glow, educational value, and soothing sounds have all contributed to a peaceful bedtime routine. If you're a parent looking for a thoughtful addition to your child's sleep environment, this clock is a fantastic choice. It's been a consistent five-star performer in our home, and we highly recommend it to others seeking a tranquil and educational sleep solution for their kids.

data.title: Amazing company
data.body: This products is great! it does what a sunrise alarm clock needs to do, and I think it is much more reasonably priced than some other alarm clocks on the market. I really only use the sunrise alarm feature, not the color or the radios, but I do like the sunset feature which I think does help me sleep. The clock definitely helps with morning grogginess and a more natural wake up, especially during the winter time. But the best part about this product is the customer service of this company. I was having some issues with my clock and reached out to the company for some troubleshooting. They were so helpful and amazing, they have gained a lifelong customer. I highly recommend buying from this company!

data.title: It wakes me up
data.body: I'm not really sure how to review this, because I am confused by this clock every single morning, but each morning that I find myself staring at it wondering what the heck is going on is a morning that it has successfully awoken me, so that must mean that it works. I fully appreciate that it is much easier to snooze the alarm than it is to shut it off, because I am notorious for shutting my alarms all the way off instead of snoozing them BECAUSE I AM STILL ASLEEP WHEN THEY FIRST GO OFF. Seriously, I sleep like the DEAD and with just the light and the pretty little birdy setting this wakes me up every time. 5 STARS

data.title: Great Product
data.body: This product is really helpful for my difficulty waking up in the morning when it stays so dark in the winter. The clock has so many features and the instruction manual is oddly super easy to understand. I was actually impressed by how well written the instructions were. I used it for the first time last night. The dawn features is GREAT! I can slowly wake up out of deep sleep to the brightness I want then my actual preset alarm and desired brightness goes off with the sound of birds. I chose cricket chirping/camp fire sound for bedtime and it was fabulous. I highly recommend this product. I'm a psychiatric mental healthcare provider and sleep is the #1 medicine....this one has my vote!

data.title: Great Customer Service!
data.body: The alarm is nice and when it stopped working, they sent us a new one promptly!

data.title: Here comes the sun!
data.body: Cannot begin to explain how much I love this alarm clock. Despite the different settings it has, it's very intuitive to set up. Since getting it, I wake up gradually on my own, without the use of a traditional alarm sound or song. I use the sunrise feature and the colors are realistic. You can adjust how long you want the "sunrise" to last, anywhere from 1-60 minutes. You can also create a sunset feel to winddown before going to sleep. And you can use the light as a reading light or soft ambient light at night. The only negative I can see is that the white noise sounds aren't that great. But I already use a white noise machine, so it's not a deal-breaker for me. Overall, I highly recommend this alarm clock!

data.title: Great product
data.body: I didn’t think I could wake up so easily. Great thing I was looking for!

data.title: Surprisingly impressed!
data.body: I love this thing! Let me preface by saying, I’m deaf and my previous alarm wasn’t working anymore - it’s a bed shaker alarm. I tried this, and after some trial/error, it’s been outstanding. Wakes me up even if I’ve only had a few hours of sleep. The alarm isn’t super loud but let’s be real - I don’t need that anyways (lol). I also appreciate the multiple colorful display screens you can put on, creates a nice ambiance to your room. Definitely a worthy buy for $35! (on sale)

data.title: Doesn't start lighting up at right time
data.body:
Two main things I'm not happy with:
1. Audio quality of pre-recorded sounds is quite poor.
2. Starting in the last two weeks (so two months after putting the clock into use), the sunrise function doesn't start lighting up in advance of the set alarm time. I have it set to start lighting up a half hour before I need to wake up, so it wakes me up gradually. This is the primary reason I got this alarm clock. Three times now it doesn't light up until the alarm time, when it lights all the way to full brightness within a few seconds and starts making the set noise. This is quite annoying, as it entirely defeats the purpose of having the alarm clock.

data.title: Great
data.body: Bought as a gift and they rave about it. Only flaw was having to click alarm button twice after sounding to ensure it resets for next morning

data.title: A better way to wake up and a great value!
data.body: My wife and wanted to be able to separate from our smart phones while in bed, and so we needed a new alarm. She's also always liked to be woken up by light rather than sound, so I got her this clock for Christmas, and she loves it. Turns out that a slowly brightening, glowing light and eventual birdsong is a nice way to wake up on dark northwest mornings! And when she's getting up early for her nursing shift, I find it easy to ease back into sleep for that all-important extra hour, before the second alarm wakes me. The clock seems to work well and has all the features we need at a great price. Recommended.

data.title: Really nice features and great customer service
data.body: The sellers are super sweet and the alarm clock has a lot of nice features. I wish the volume was a bit louder but if you put it closer to you it sounds pretty good

data.title: Great clock and customer service
data.body: I wanted this for my son because he needed an alarm and we don't allow our kids to keep their phones in their rooms at night. This clock has a lot of features and the instructions can be tedious but don't give up! If you have any questions email the seller and they do get back quickly with excellent customer service. I was initially frustrated because my son set the time for the 12 hour clock and set the wrong AM/PM. I was about to send it back because there are reviews saying you can't change the time. YOU CAN! The customer service is awesome, the seller responded quickly and followed up to be sure everything was working for me.
